MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G43 postcode area of Glasgow. It is  necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am to repair a fault on ou underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:48am on 27th of October 2020.
